title: Porous activated carbons derived from waste Moroccan pine cones for high-performance adsorption of bisphenol A from water
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Yassine Jari, Nicolas Roche, Mohamed Chaker Necibi, Fatima Zahra Falil, Saida Tayibi, Karim Lyamlouli, Abdelghani Chehbouni, Bouchaib Gourich
